Friends and Friends: May 2010 be a great year and your dearest dreams come true. Up the hearts because better times are coming

Happy New Year everyone. Thank you again this year. I started Twitter and blog "pigeon cafe" from today. Please send your feedback to @hatoyamayukio http://bit.ly/7OSH1o. One day tweets are the goal until you get used to it.
New Year's greetings from Prime Minister to the Internet http://www.pm.go.th/node/7792
In the New Year's Eve, I invited a recommendation for inclusion. employment and value creation. Read the speech http://bit.ly/5RUdjW and input. #Work

Thank you very much for following me. I read the comment "Are you really writing?" Basically I write it while listening to the opinions of the staff. Send it to a secretary with e-mail, and that person is doing sending to Twitter.

I will send it continuously. I asked the staff, Twitter seems to have about 1,000 people who can follow on the 1st day. I can not follow all people who follow you as soon as I am struggling, but I will do it in order. In addition, we updated the blog. http://bit.ly/8DtvJQ
Today we once again visit Zagreb (Botinec, Sesvete, Brezovica), afternoon in Dugi Selo and Zaprešić, and tomorrow ... http://bit.ly/5YS8AJ

Do you know the prime minister's annual impression? The prime minister of the past has talked about that feeling at the beginning of the year. I want to devise a way to convey my feelings to each of these messages. Please read. http://bit.ly/8 DEblf
"They contacted me from Milan Bandic and they asked for my support, but I decided to give my voice ... http://bit.ly/64VrN7
We have just released the fourth temporary financial report. http://bit.ly/7FtjDo
I posted 30 photo (s) on Facebook in the album "Doecek Nove godine" http://bit.ly/8MMQm5
Tomorrow we are in Dubrovnik, Metković and Vrgorac.And evening in Split on Peristil. Join! http://bit.ly/8JRnbM

I got into the garden of the official residence early this morning by a good sunshine, it is very cold. The New Year was hit by heavy snow in many places, but how was everyone? My cabinet is starting full-scale work from today. I will continue to do my utmost with my life in mind this year as well. Thank you.
Thanks to Dubrovnik! Thanks to Metković! Thanks Vrgorac! http://bit.ly/92iEyc

I was pointed out that I'm really following reading about what you are following "and" I can not follow so much ". Certainly I can not read all comments, but I always want to display your comments on the office's monitor and I want to know your voice even a little by reading it.
Here are some biographical data for those who have not had the opportunity to read so far. http://bit.ly/8cJEMq

I decided to walk in the garden of the official residence on a fine weather morning. The cold weather is rather pleasant. Recently I was in shortage of exercise, so I would like to continue. The audience was a pigeon. http://twitvideo.jp/003cu
Thailand News Government Contributions throughout 2009 http://www.pm.go.th/media/confidence/8005
Today we are in Osijek, Trpinji, Vinkovci, Vukovar and Ilok. http://bit.ly/77JFOC
Watch the live stream at http://www.ustream.tv!
One of the best things we encountered during this campaign :) http://bit.ly/6y7v7Q

byo... http://bit.ly/8f5b6n
Tonight is a confrontation with NovaTV, let's see! http://bit.ly/5tlLkp

I appreciate the efforts of former Minister Fujii, and I wish you a speedy recovery as soon as possible. I would like to keep pace with the citizens' lives by working closely with Minister Sugi, Minister Sendai and other ministers. http://bit.ly/8mai9E
Big in Japan! (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qNkh3wkriOk) http://bit.ly/7gpHz9
No one should have a bad conscience to be sick: http://bit.ly/8Q3jqF
The road to happiness, just two days :) http://bit.ly/68VJjc
Tonight; NovaTV 21:45 confrontation. Keep your fingers. http://bit.ly/6I2rob
Arriving at tvn for midnight interview with scarlet cardenas

I had a very good time. Mr. Noguchi, thank you. I also wrote it on my blog. http @ /bit.ly/63dAUf RT @ Astro_Soichi: I talked with VIP calls with Prime Minister Hatoyama, Minister Kawabata and Chigasaki children!
Many thanks 4 all the New Year's wishes. Good 2 B back in the saddle after the school holidays. Any NY's resolutions? Mine: 1GOAL!
@NEYKOU If ur interested in how Jordan is trying 2 go green in the desert, take a look at the RSCN website: http://bit.ly/7B5p3F
Chatted to friend Shania Twain for CBC radio show The Current about benefits of education. Tune in on Fri 8:30 am if ur in Canada!
Tonight, the last debate on HTV. See you! http://bit.ly/7DnkAD
It is very cold everyday. I calm my mind by drinking Hajiji every morning. I am especially looking for warm tea to drink after walking.
Arriving in Santiago after a tour to the south where we made our commitments to the native peoples, the regions, the sport ...
With Sebastian Keitel we were also in Valdivia, Osorno, Los Angeles. We take advantage of jogging and cycling some areas
Tomorrow our commitments with taxi drivers and bus drivers and many more activities. There are very few days left for the election!
Thank you for various opinions. I have read it interestingly and accept it seriously.
I was able to talk to a real "alien". Thank you Mr. Noguchi. RT @ Astro_Soichi: Thanks to everyone who commented on the VIP call. I enjoyed talking with Prime Minister "Alien"!
If you did not catch my interview with Shania Twain, check it out: http://bit.ly/8Ajyr4
Think u can describe why education matters in fewer than 5 words or 5 seconds? Give it a shot here: http://bit.ly/5lyxe4 # My5
Khadija. Musu. Zanele. Devli. Maha. These are My 5 for Education. What are yours? http://bit.ly/5lyxe4 # My5
Live stream from HND: http://www.24sata.hr/josipovic/ http://bit.ly/86KSjw
Friends, thank you all !!!! Please wait for some more patience until the first unofficial results from DIP. At midnight ... http://bit.ly/8endob
Look forward to you :) http://bit.ly/5IcuBO
Dear friends, thank you very much for the support I received not only today but the past few months. On this link ... http://bit.ly/8z3D52

Congratulations to all the new adults. I remember old days when I was an adult. When I am young, I want you to live exactly and make good memories. Please make it such a year that you can look back "that time was such a thing."
Once again, thanks to everyone, we are overwhelmed with congratulations and we will need days to go through them. On this page you can find ... http://bit.ly/6Jw10c
Sick leave is going down, but employees will still be entitled to full pay during illness: http://bit.ly/722c5s
Background image The President of the Children's Day. Take the Prime Chair to the children. http://ow.ly/VujE
Review the issue of the request to the TC and actually sign it with other senators and I did not remember. Nobility obliges I correct the error
The answer to the question http://pm.go.th 1. Lottery online. 2. Government does not work. 3. Check all corruption of the ministry. http://bit.ly/8tayWC
Background image Mr. Cow milking in 3 southern border provinces. http://ow.ly/VunH

Japan time will be open tomorrow, the Japan-US Foreign Ministers' Meeting will be held in Hawaii. The Japan-U.S. Alliance is the basis of Japanese diplomacy. I look forward to Minister for Foreign Affairs Okada.
Mr. Sivarak Chutipong paid tribute and thanked the Prime Minister for helping http://ow.ly/VStp
Prime Minister at the Government House. http://ow.ly/VSAA

Our thoughts and prayers are with the families of the 3 Jordanian UN Peacekeepers killed in Haiti, and their injured collections.
RT @unicefusa If you want to DONATE to HAITI EARTHQUAKE RELIEF: http: //tinyurl.com/ya6kpzm
Join the outpouring of humanity for Haiti: help UNICEF supply water, shelter, medical supplies and more: http://bit.ly/6s4Pd4 Help Haiti.

At the end of last year I summarized the draft budget plan for fiscal 2010. It is an important tax deposited with you. We aimed "from concrete to people" to enhance the budget for child allowance, free high school grant, medical care, employment etc. Please see PDF on PC. http://bit.ly/8iBzLn
Help Haiti. http://bit.ly/6s4Pd4 Reassuring to see our humanity kick into gear and countries sending aid already.
I posted 30 photo (s) on Facebook in the album "Second round of presidential elections on 10.01.2010." Http://bit.ly/5K3Wm7
Lunch to go with the batteries put to the party of change in Pudahuel
Yesterday was the party of change in Peñalolen. Today in Pudahuel. Morning in Valparaiso, Talca and Concepcion. And on Sunday, the Great Triumph of Chile
I started Twitter on New Year's Day, and it was only two weeks at last. Your voice has become more familiar than before. We received diverse opinions from many people. thank you very much.
Loxley meets Prime The intent is to get a good deal without having to file a lawsuit online. http://ow.ly/WigS
Behind the scenes, the prime minister leads the youths to visit Thai Koo Fah Building. The week before http://ow.ly/WiiW

My heart ached in the picture which conveyed the huge damage of the earthquake of Haiti. I would like to express my sincere condolences to all of you in Haiti. I would like you to get back as soon as possible. I want to help even a little. Because of that, the Japanese government decided emergency assistance. http://bit.ly/8xgb2S
Prime Minister aims to create a new economic system. "Social Enterprise" http://www.pm.go.th/blog/8386
This week's e-mail magazine's theme is about global warming. Please read. http://bit.ly/83NHUq
2 planes left 2 Haiti upon instructions from my husband ..
Carrying mobile field hospital, 5 doctors, & 6 tons of supplies / aid- Shelters, sleeping bags, & essentials
And, of course, constant prayers from all of us.
Watch the show "Thailand's confidence in Prime Minister Abhisit" today 9.00 am on Channel 11

Fifteen years have passed since the Great Hanshin-Awaji earthquake today. Today I attended a ceremony in Kobe, I express my deepest condolences to those who passed away by the earthquake and my bereaved family. Based on this precious lesson, we will continue to steadily advance "politeness to cherish life" in terms of disaster prevention measures. Please see with PC http://bit.ly/7MzM7a
I wrote my thoughts about the memorial ceremony of today's Hanshin-Awaji earthquake on my blog. http://bit.ly/8ZRbfi
Today we wake up very early with Cecilia. We eat breakfast with our children and grandchildren. We went to vote and ask God for wisdom and strength
Amid the death and destruction, heroism and humanity are shining through: http://bit.ly/5A6mvT

The normal Diet will start from today. We will do our utmost to defend our lives and realize politics with the lives of citizens first, we will do our utmost to achieve the second supplementary budget, early establishment of the fiscal 2010 budget, and other measures. I am very sorry that the current Democratic House of Representatives member of the House of Representatives was arrested, but I think I will keep a close eye on the progress of the investigation.
Revision of Cabinet This is already done.
Thank you all for your support and good vibes. We are thinking of a government with big, ambitious and feasible goals.
We are going to defeat underdevelopment, we will defeat poverty and we will achieve real opportunities for all.
And our generation, the generation of the bicentennial, has in its hands to make Chile a more just, fraternal, and great country. Viva Chile
Thailand News Watch Old School Prime http://www.pm.go.th/media/confidence/8553
Prime Minister Speeches at Foreign Correspondents' Association http://ow.ly/XxxI

Tune into @kingsthings 2 hour special on Haiti 2night.I'm on w / Colin Powell, Sarah Ferguson, @Alyssa_Milano, @johncmayer and more!

On the first day of the regular session of the National Assembly yesterday, following the rigorous opening ceremony which met the Emperor 's Emperor, the opening ceremony of the House of Representatives conference started with the financial speech of Minister of Finance Minister Kan. Today the debate starts with the representative of the House of Representatives. I will tighten myself and see you.
I will start on higher education and research at the contact conference at 09.30. Follow the shipment here: http://bit.ly/4EW4sp
A sombre day; His Majesty & I received the bodies of 3 courageous Jordanian peacekeepers killed in Haiti. God bless their souls.
I think that it was possible to have a heavy discussion today. The regular Diet session is 150 days. I will do my utmost throughout the day for the citizens.
Prime Minister photo with the new Cabinet http://www.flickr.com/photos/thaigov/4284628629/in/set-72157623110855691/
Prime Minister invites more than 10,000 Chinese couples to wed in Thailand http://ow.ly/Ys2B
Prime Minister to kick off special football with the Royal Navy Rayong. http://ow.ly/Ys34
UNICEF has been in Haiti helping children since 1949 & continues to do so today- Please follow UNICEF http://twitter.com/unicef
Hi @BillGates nice to see u here.Hope we'll get a chance to meet up in Davos.
@mrskutcher Great to see you here as well! Hope our paths ever cross in the real world.

The House of Representatives and Budget Committee has started. From today it is a real debate. I will tighten myself and see you. The supplementary budget for your peace of mind and growth is being discussed. The content is here. Please see PDF on PC. http://bit.ly/6PcD64
Prime Minister at Thai Koo Fah Building Government House http://ow.ly/Ys45
Tapioca and Tapioca Association Meet the prime minister of flour moths. http://ow.ly/Ys84

I wrote about the supplementary budget and the budget for next year discussed in the National Assembly and about the problems of political funds in the mail magazine. take a look. I would like to listen seriously to your opinions and criticism. http://bit.ly/4xnrG8
Photos of the World Cup http://bit.ly/4TJSvn
Have blogged about work on a new contract for reduced sickness absence at work.mittarbeiderparti.no: http://bit.ly/4Eimjf

Today, I visited Tochigi prefecture and asked the staff of strawberry farmers and everyone involved in Mashiko, as well as the live voices of advanced technology companies, night nurseries, medical and nursing care workers. I will cherish everyone's voice and I will make it to politics. I am planning to go on and on and on in the future.

Mail arrived from Rep. Koyoku Fujita, who is going to Haiti this morning. We are deeply grateful to President for the support of Japan. I will let you know about the situation of the afflicted area, activities of the aid team, so I'd like to report it all in a blog soon.
Regular Diet, first week passed. It is fulfilling everyday. I thought that I am interested in what kind of days I wrote on my blog. http://bit.ly/8ZRbfi

Even during the Diet period, I will visit various places as much as possible on weekends in order to hear your voice directly. Yesterday I went to Tochigi prefecture. The photo is black tea and Pon Bunch with Miko grilled ware. I also heard that I want to send Mashiko brand abroad. http://bit.ly/6il46G
# Top50Jo Dibbeen and Ajloun in the Spring
# Top50Jo The khirfan (sheep) that have as much right as anyone to the streets!
# Top50Jo That while everyone raves about benefits of olive oil, we ONLY ever use it!
Zaatar, Abu Mahjoob, the Hatta ...
# Top50Jo our GORGEOUS sunshine, our mystic mountains in Wadi Rum and Aqaba.
# Top50Jo My King
# Top50Jo RT @imadnaffa Dear Queen Rania: U may want 2 post uplifting article I posted abt Jordan & Peanut Man: http://ow.ly/ZptU #JO
http://twitpic.com/zl5zy - # Top50Jo Remember chatting 2 Abu Ahmad in downtown Amman. He's a legend. Such a warm & generous spirit. May God r
Thank you to everyone who sets up and contributes to the artist talent of Haiti tonight. The government doubles emergency aid from 100 to 200 million kr
Woke up to tragic news: an Ethiopian Airlines jet crashed in sea off Beirut this morning. My heart goes out to loved ones waiting for news.
God bless the courageous search and rescue teams battling interminable conditions in the sea to find survivors.
Prime Reply to http://pm.go.th 1. ICT to use data capture? 2. The GT200 Amphetamine Detector? 3. http://bit.ly/7UaAZL
The supplementary budget passed the House of Representatives earlier. It is deliberation at the Upper House from tomorrow. I will tighten myself and see you.
Young people from the school of Wu Zhou Seo to meet the Prime Minister before the water level. Asia Pacific http://www.flickr.com/photos/thaigov/4305414991/
Yesterday, January 25, 2010, we submitted the final financial report of the election campaign. Auditor's opinion and list ... http://bit.ly/507FIg
Mr. Suwat Liptapanlop meets Prime Minister, donates money from King's Cup football to help victims of Haiti. http://ow.ly/10tqm
Today, it is one year since the government's action package was presented. We can now summarize that the measures worked. http://bit.ly/64golA

I received my report from the Democratic Party of Japan Study Team visiting Haiti, Rep. Koyoku Fujita and Representative Nobuhiko Shuto, I wrote my thoughts on the blog. Please have a look. http://bit.ly/8ZRbfi

"New Public" round table meeting began. This conference aims to make citizens, NPOs and companies more active in public situations. We received active discussions and valuable suggestions and received great intellectual stimulation.
Scarf: check. Gloves: check. Warmest coat: check. Secret hand warmers: check. I'm ready for the World Economic Forum at Davos!
#WEF theme: Rethink. Redesign. Rebuild. MY theme for #WEF: Education. Education. Education. Are our themes synonymous?
Come to "The inauguration ceremony" Thursday, February 18 from 12:00 am to 3:00 am http://bit.ly/cciC3K
Today, the supplementary budget passed by the Upper House, was established. Next time we will advance the next fiscal year budget, politics for your life a step by step.

I decided to hold an event entitled "Real Pigeon Cafe" in order to listen to the opinions of everyone's lives. I will also enter the circle of talk. The first "child rearing cafe" is in mid-February. If you would like to participate, please click here. http://bit.ly/8ZRbfi

Today, I will make a speech policy speech. I have thought and devoted myself to himself since I was a business trip to India at the end of last year. Please listen to it in live broadcast from 1 pm. If you watch it on PC, it is here. http://bit.ly/9C7Xd4
Early morning, sun not up in snowy serene Davos. Getting ready for marathon meetings / interviews
Was nice to see P.Clinton. Heard abt his tire effort & concern 4 people of Haiti. Stories of survival, hope the world must never forget
http://twitpic.com/10b675 - Feeling very proud at Davos, His Majesty: "If someone threatens my people I have the right to defend them"
His Majesty at Davos: "For evil to succeed is for a good man to do nothing", "It boils down to: Education, Education, Education!"

Today, both the House of Representatives made a speech policy speech. A total of 1 hour and 40 minutes, the voice withered, but I gave my utmost to say the most. Please take a look at PC. http://bit.ly/bOgCQJ
http://twitpic.com/10bcsx - 2 of my wonderful girls, the force behind what I do, and oh yeah, that guy there is Pres Clinton
In Ruhango, highlights his interest in politics that pull Rwandans from poverty and takes Rwanda towards development.http://bit.ly/dlnJHW
Prime Minister dined at the World Economic Forum 2010 in Davos. http://twitpic.com/10g6rd (image by @korbsak)
Stepped off #WEF panel on education into BBC interviews.Dynamic discussion, inspired that edu message resonating w WEFers.
Was moved by applause 4 role of edu in Palestine-Israel. Our hope not w doctors on either side but w new gen 2 overcome hate & fear

Today I visited Yamanashi Prefecture and talked with the university students in the prefecture as a base seat. I was very dependable on young people who made ties dyed with wine to revitalize the local industry and passionate about developing fuel cells. Everyone college students who have a certain "whereabouts and turnouts" in this area gained spirits.

A month has passed since I started Twitter. Reading comments received from everyone has become a little fun of recent times. Thank you very much. Of course, there are some earwaxing opinions, but I have taken it properly.
After short yet intense time at Davos, went on to battle the elements-snow, rain etc, but made it home in time for husband & son's bday
Yes, 5 years ago I did not know what to get my husband for his birthday, so I got him a son :)

Yesterday, during a meeting with local people at Kofu, when I looked out, Mt. Fuji was faintly seen in Zenkoji in Kofu and in the other side. It is a beautiful sight unique to midwinter. http://bit.ly/c7JjRc
http://twitpic.com/10pou8 - At my son's birthday party
Thank you for various opinions on the administrative policy speech on 29th. I am reading. The speech is posted here. Please see with PC. http://bit.ly/bOgCQJ
